meanings.definition: To improve or enhance the quality or value of something.
meanings.sent1: She upgraded her phone to get better features.
meanings.sent2: The company upgraded their software to fix bugs.
meanings.sent3: He upgraded his sandwich with extra cheese.
meanings.sent4: The garden was upgraded with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher upgraded the lesson with interactive activities.

meanings.definition: To raise to a higher standard or level.
meanings.sent1: The student upgraded his performance in the exam.
meanings.sent2: The chef upgraded the dish by adding a special sauce.
meanings.sent3: The cat upgraded its nap spot to the sunny window.
meanings.sent4: Her smile upgraded the mood of the room.
meanings.sent5: The athlete upgraded his record with a new personal best.

meanings.definition: To install or use a newer or better version of something.
meanings.sent1: They upgraded their computer to run faster.
meanings.sent2: The hotel upgraded their rooms with modern amenities.
meanings.sent3: He upgraded his gaming console for better graphics.
meanings.sent4: The city upgraded its public transportation system.
meanings.sent5: She upgraded her wardrobe with stylish clothes.
